content.text: Bureaucracy chief of Arshalan. Leader of the Evindarli family, one of the most powerful Leonin clans. Married to Alherya and father of Kashyam. Made a pact with an Abyssal being in the past for greater power.

infoTabs.label: Appearance
infoTabs.placeholder: Physique, unique anatomical features, skin/feather/fur pigmentation, clothes they usually wear, overall cleanliness...

infoTabs.label: Psychology
infoTabs.placeholder: How they think: motives, virtues, vices, flaws, attitude/behavior, sexuality...

infoTabs.label: Affiliations
infoTabs.placeholder: Who they associate with and how they got involved...

infoTabs.label: Sociology
infoTabs.placeholder: Describe how they interact with family, love interests, friends, strangers, mentors...

infoTabs.label: Perspective
infoTabs.placeholder: Political views, religious ideas, interests, hobbies...

infoTabs.label: Journey
infoTabs.placeholder: Where they started, what conflicts are encountered, how their character evolves...

infoTabs.label: History
infoTabs.placeholder: What happened before the story started: where they were born, how they were raised and how it affected them, level of education they achieved, career path(s), suffered trauma...

content.text: Wife. In a loveless political marriage. Vastly different ideologies and beliefs.
His boss. Old friend who is slowly becoming demented.
Mistrust. He knows there is something up with the Grand Vizier and there is more to him than meets the eye.
